comment: * Builder for {@link InsertGesture}. This class is not designed to be thread-safe.

methods.name: public Builder setTextToInsert(@NonNull String text)
methods.comment:
* Set the text that will be inserted at {@link #setInsertionPoint(PointF)}. When set with
         * an empty string, cursor will be moved to {@link #getInsertionPoint()} and no text
         * would be inserted.

methods.name: public Builder setInsertionPoint(@NonNull PointF point)
methods.comment:
* Sets the insertion point (in screen coordinates) where {@link #setTextToInsert(String)}
         * should be inserted.

methods.name: public Builder setFallbackText(@Nullable String fallbackText)
methods.comment:
* Set fallback text that will be committed at current cursor position if there is no
         * applicable text beneath the area of gesture.
         * @param fallbackText text to set

methods.name: public InsertGesture build()
methods.comment:
* @return {@link InsertGesture} using parameters in this {@link InsertGesture.Builder}.
         * @throws IllegalArgumentException if one or more positional parameters are not specified.
